INSERT /*MS-YRD-PRICE-CONTACT-LETTER-COMPANY-REPORT-PRICE-DETAIL-INSERT*/ INTO price_contact_letter_company_report_price_detail(id,company_report_price_id,parent_catalog_id,parent_catalog_name,catalog_id,catalog_name,insurance_product_id,insurance_product_name,responsibility_scope,property_category,premium_amount,borker_amount,charge_rate,borker_amount_rate,insurance_amount,insurance_way,deductible_rate,premium_rate,limit_amount_type,limit_amount,expect_premium_amount,intention_broker_rate,non_deductible,product_id,product_name,packing_quantity,sign,job,age_group,person_num,programme,goods,target,version,ext) VALUES (#id#,#companyReportPriceId#,#parentCatalogId#,#parentCatalogName#,#catalogId#,#catalogName#,#insuranceProductId#,#insuranceProductName#,#responsibilityScope#,#propertyCategory#,#premiumAmount#,#borkerAmount#,#chargeRate#,#borkerAmountRate#,#insuranceAmount#,#insuranceWay#,#deductibleRate#,#premiumRate#,#limitAmountType#,#limitAmount#,#expectPremiumAmount#,#intentionBrokerRate#,#nonDeductible#,#productId#,#productName#,#packingQuantity#,#sign#,#job#,#ageGroup#,#personNum#,#programme#,#goods#,#target#,#version#,#ext#)
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
sqlMap.update: update /*MS-YRD-PRICE-CONTACT-LETTER-COMPANY-REPORT-PRICE-DETAIL-UPDATE*/ price_contact_letter_company_report_price_detail set company_report_price_id=#companyReportPriceId#, parent_catalog_id=#parentCatalogId#, parent_catalog_name=#parentCatalogName#, catalog_id=#catalogId#, catalog_name=#catalogName#, insurance_product_id=#insuranceProductId#, insurance_product_name=#insuranceProductName#, responsibility_scope=#responsibilityScope#, property_category=#propertyCategory#, premium_amount=#premiumAmount.cent#, borker_amount=#borkerAmount.cent#, charge_rate=#chargeRate#, borker_amount_rate=#borkerAmountRate#, insurance_amount=#insuranceAmount.cent#, insurance_way=#insuranceWay#, deductible_rate=#deductibleRate#, premium_rate=#premiumRate#, limit_amount_type=#limitAmountType#, limit_amount=#limitAmount.cent#, expect_premium_amount=#expectPremiumAmount.cent#, intention_broker_rate=#intentionBrokerRate#, non_deductible=#nonDeductible#, product_id=#productId#, product_name=#productName#, packing_quantity=#packingQuantity#, sign=#sign#, job=#job#, age_group=#ageGroup#, person_num=#personNum#, programme=#programme#, goods=#goods#, target=#target#, version=#version#, ext=#ext# where (id = #id#)
sqlMap.select: select /*MS-YRD-PRICE-CONTACT-LETTER-COMPANY-REPORT-PRICE-DETAIL-FIND-BY-ID*/ id, company_report_price_id, parent_catalog_id, parent_catalog_name, catalog_id, catalog_name, insurance_product_id, insurance_product_name, responsibility_scope, property_category, premium_amount, borker_amount, charge_rate, borker_amount_rate, insurance_amount, insurance_way, deductible_rate, premium_rate, limit_amount_type, limit_amount, expect_premium_amount, intention_broker_rate, non_deductible, product_id, product_name, packing_quantity, sign, job, age_group, person_num, programme, goods, target, version, ext from price_contact_letter_company_report_price_detail where (id = #value#)
